HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Standardna dostava (GLS, DPD, UPS): 4,49€. Brza dostava (GLS, DPD): 4,99€. Wolt Drive dostava: od 5,99€.
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: Standardna dostava: 3 do 9 dana. Brza dostava: 1 do 3 dana. Wolt Drive: U roku od 2 sata.

express_delivery.delivery_time: Brza dostava (GLS, DPD): 1 do 3 dana. Wolt Drive dostava: U roku od 2 sata.
express_delivery.pricing: Brza dostava: 4,99€. Wolt Drive dostava: Od 5,99€ do 7,99€ ovisno o zoni (do 10km od trgovine).

HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: Na određene otoke i udaljena mjesta dostava nije moguća ili je moguća samo do najbližeg kurirskog terminala. Postoji mogućnost odstupanja od očekivanog datuma dostave. Za detalje je potrebno provjeriti rasporede dostave za DPD i GLS.
HOME_DELIVERY.cod_surcharge: Plaćanje pouzećem je moguće do maksimalnog iznosa od 1660.00€. Nije navedena posebna naknada.

Teži nestandardni paketi: 20,00 € ili 22,00 €.
BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: Dostava na određene otoke i udaljena mjesta nije moguća ili je moguća samo do najbližeg kurirskog terminala. Postoji mogućnost odstupanja od očekivanog datuma dostave. Za detalje je potrebno provjeriti raspored dostave za Intereuropa.

PARCEL_SHOPS.cod_surcharge: Plaćanje pouzećem je moguće do maksimalnog iznosa od 1660.00€. Nije navedena posebna naknada.

express_delivery.delivery_time: Dostupno isti dan, moguće preuzimanje u roku od 1h ako je proizvod dostupan u odabranoj trgovini.

IN_STORE_PICKUP.cod_surcharge: Plaćanje pouzećem je moguće do maksimalnog iznosa od 10000.00€. Nije navedena posebna naknada.

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: Decathlon.hr offers several delivery methods: Home Delivery (Standard, Fast, and Express via Wolt Drive), Bulky Item Delivery, Parcel Shop Pickup, and free In-Store Pickup.
PROVIDERS: Main couriers are GLS, DPD, and UPS. Bulky items are handled by Intereuropa. Express local delivery is provided by Wolt Drive.
PRICING: Standard home delivery is €4.49, while fast delivery is €4.99. Parcel shop delivery costs €2.99 (standard) or €3.49 (fast). In-store pickup is always free. Bulky items have specific pricing, with bicycles costing around €7.99-€9.99 and heavier items €20.00-€22.00.
RESTRICTIONS: Delivery to certain Croatian islands and remote areas is limited or may incur delays. Cash on Delivery (COD) is available up to €1660 for deliveries and €10000 for in-store pickup, but is not an option for Wolt Drive deliveries. Parcel shop deliveries have size and weight limits (e.g., max 20kg for DPD, 5kg for GLS).
NOTABLE FEATURES: A key feature is the Wolt Drive service, offering delivery within 2 hours in a 10km radius of a store. In-store pickup is also very fast, with items often ready in 1 hour if in stock locally. There is a price difference for shipping bicycles from the warehouse versus from a store, as store-shipped bikes are pre-assembled.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is presented clearly and comprehensively on a dedicated 'Uvjeti dostave' page. The use of icons, tables, and a detailed FAQ section makes it easy for customers to find and understand delivery options, costs, and limitations. The information is well-organized and complete.
